ygData.subject: Re: All Read - Council Matter
ygData.msgSnippet: Teleportation should be restricted based on range not banned. Skywarp could teleport short distances, the beast machines mirage can too, try to use this input

Teleportation should be restricted based on range not banned. Skywarp 
could teleport short distances, the beast machines mirage can too, 
try to use this input before making a final judgement.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Ok, everyone, teleportation is ILLEGAL.  So anyone and everyone 
who uses it, 
> stop now.  If you continue too, you will be strictly punished by 
the Council.
> 
> 
> 
> Thank you.
> 
> 
> Lord Unitron
> KSLawDogg@c...
